Business Sign Up Privacy Statement

25-07-2023

 

This privacy statement is applicable to all visits on our website (www.secretview.io) and our platform (https://platform.secretview.io), the mobile application, the agreement existing between you and us when you are registered to our platform as a community member, as well as the assignments you do as a mystery shopper. By visiting the website and/or the platform, you agree to this statement. Changes in this statement will be valid as soon as they are applied (see Last updated above). When this statement changes, we will publish a notification on the platform.

We, Secret Collect B.V., called “Secret View” hereafter, are responsible for processing personal data as described in this privacy statement. Our contact details are:

Velperplein 23A

6811 AH Arnhem

CoC no.: 62351761

Phone: +31 26 - 20 22 151

E-mail: support@secretview.io

This privacy statement was originally written in Dutch. In the event a translation of this privacy statement conflicts with the Dutch original version, the original version will always take precedence. This privacy statement may be modified by Secret View at any moment.

Should you have any questions and/or remarks about this privacy statement, please contact us via the live chat or via mysteryshopping@secretview.io.

Short version

We value your privacy and strive to protect it. In this privacy statement we’ll explain which personal data is collected and why it is being processed. The (personal) data we process will never be shared with third parties without your explicit prior consent. You’ll find the highlights in this short summary, but we recommend you read the full version carefully.

We collect all information, including personal data, that you provide us with. Aside from that, we also store technical information like cookies to make sure you experience on the website and the platform is as comfortable and personal as possible. All data is stored in secured servers that are not accessible to unauthorized personnel.

The platform uses several technological mechanisms to automate our processes. This includes automated decision-making based on profile and experience. An example of this is the eligibility of a mystery shopper for a certain assignment.

If you would like to exercise your right to object and/or your right to data portability, or do you have any other questions about our data processing? Please contact us with a specific request at support@secretview.io.

Long version

We process data from the following groups:

  1. Visitors of our website www.secretview.io;
  2. People registered as mystery shoppers with Secret View;
  3. Contacts of Secret View’s clients.

Below we will outline per group the personal data we process and why we do so.

  1. Website visitors

We process visitors’ personal data on our website www.secretview.io by placing cookies and similar technologies such as web beacons.

A cookie is a small text file that is stored in your computer’s browser, tablet or smartphone when you first visit the website. We use functional, analytical and tracking cookies. On your first visit, we’ve informed you of these cookies and asked for your permission to store them in your browser. Please find all information about our cookies in our Cookie Policy.

  1. Community members

When you register as a community member on our platform, you engage in an agreement with us. To carry out this agreement, e.g., do mystery shopping research, it is necessary for us to process some of your personal data. We’ll sum up the data we process:

-         . Name

-         . Sex

-         . Date of birth

-         . Address

-         . Phone number

-         . E-mail address

-         . Other data that is actively provided by creating a profile, in writing or by phone

-         . Location details

-         . Banking details

-         . Financial remunerations

Without these details we are unable to hold our part of the agreement. In order to fulfill our legal and societal duties we will process data in the event of (suspected) cases of illegal activities by members of our community and provide them to authorities. Also, we store verified addresses by using iDIN (https://www.idin.nl/disclaimer-privacy/) in order to be able to take legal action in the event of illegal activities.

Why do we process personal data?

We process your personal data to:

-         . Allow you to create an online account

-         . Assign one or more mystery shopping assignments to you

-         . Communicate with you in relation to the assignments

-         . Handle payments

-         . Verify your age when you apply for an age-related assignment that legally requires us to verify your age (e.g. alcohol and tobacco sales compliance research)

-         . Analyze user behavior on our website and platform to improve our online tools and to adapt our services to your preferences

-         . Being able to create analyses and anonymized statistics on the basis of your age, income and other data you have shared with us, that helps us inform our clients (for example: “mystery shoppers between 40- and 45-years old rate your store the highest”);

-         . Follow up on complaints and questions

-         . Carry out legal duties or court rulings, such as providing data for tax returns

-         . Preventing misuse and abuse

What else do we do with your data?

To make your experience as a mystery shopper as good as possible, your data is saved in your online account. This way you won’t need to enter your data repeatedly.

Community Approval

The results from our researches go through a quality control before they are validated and sent to our clients. This approval process is carried out by Secret View employees, but also by other members of the community (mystery shoppers). Community members with this capacity are called Community Approvers and are carefully selected by us. Therefore, it is possible that another community member gets to view the questionnaire you send in. We take every possible step to decrease the chance a Community Approver gets insight into personal data. Your questionnaire is anonymized and there is a blackout tool that can be used to blur out certain sections. However, you are personally responsible for the information you provide textually in your answers about yourself or other people in describing certain situations. The Community Approver can edit and/or improve the answers you provide.

Automated decision-making

Using automated decision-making processes allows us to more efficiently handle large numbers of (mystery shopping) assignments. These automated processes may have consequences for registered community members regarding planning and/or carrying out assignments. The processes lead to decision made by computer programs or systems without human (i.e., a Secret View employee) interference/involvement.

We use the following computer programs and systems:

Name:

Self-developed software

Why do we use it?

The software we develop in-house is used to make carrying out research and insights into its results as efficient and user-friendly as possible.

What automated process take place in the software?

The following processes may be (to some extent) automated:

  • Profile and account management
  • Insight into all assignments
  • Selection of mystery shoppers
  • Insight into assignment status
  • Information supply for assignments
  • Handling payments

To make the transition period from manual to automated processes as smooth as possible, every automation (process, decision-making, specific actions) is first rolled out in phases. The automated process, decision or action will first be shown to the employee and/or user, who will manually have to confirm the event. Only when we are sure the automation works as intended at all times, we will allow the automation to take place without human interference. Using this method, we make sure users will not notice the transition from manual to automation – except for the efficiency and user-friendliness increases.

As a community member, you have the right to voice your opinion with regards to an automated decision that involves you, and to object to this decision. If you do not agree with an automated decision, please feel free to contact us. An employee will manually review the decision. By agreeing to carry out assignments (and our Terms &. Conditions and this Privacy Policy), you explicitly agree with the use of automated decision-making processes in our platform.

How long do we store personal data?

We do not store your data any longer than is strictly necessary to achieve the goals they are collected for. Moreover, you can delete your account if you wish to do so, unless there is still an assignment to be carried out in that you are scheduled for.

If you exercise this right to be forgotten, your profile we be deleted from our platform immediately. All other personal data will be deleted after sending a request by e-mail to mysteryshopping@secretview.io. All personal data will be deleted within the space of two months unless the data is required to comply with government regulations. With regards to the latter, we maintain a 7-year storage period due to fiscal obligations.

  1. Client contacts

When we engage in a contract with a new client, we process personal data of the contacts of that client. Both Secret View and the client have a legitimate interest in processing this data because it allows the research(es) to be carried out and the client to use the results to their benefit.

The summary below also applies to those contacts who are themselves (co-)owner of the business we have a contract with.

To that end, we process the following data:

  • Name
  • Company name
  • Phone number
  • E-mail address
  • Other data that is actively provided by creating a profile, in writing or by phone

Why do we process personal data?

We process your personal data to:

-         . Being able to reach an agreement with the client

-         . Communicate with the client (‘s contacts) with regards to the agreement

-         . Handle payments

-         . Analyze user behavior on our website and platform to improve our online tools and to adapt our services to your preferences

-         . Follow up on complaints and questions

-         . Carry out legal duties or court rulings, such as providing data for tax returns

How long do we store personal data?

We do not store your data any longer than is strictly necessary to achieve the goals they are collected for.

If you exercise your right to be forgotten, your profile we be deleted from our platform immediately. All other personal data will be deleted after sending a request by e-mail to support@secretview.io. Once an agreement with a client ends, all personal data will be deleted within the space of three months, unless the data is required to comply with government regulations. With regards to the latter, we maintain a seven-year storage period.

  1. All users

The following information is applicable to all users in mentioned above.

Sharing data with third parties

We never sell personal data to third parties. We will only supply these if it is required to do so in order to carry out the agreement made with the user or to adhere to legal regulations or court rulings. Some parties do receive your personal data and we always sign a processor agreement with these parties to ensure a high standard of protection and confidentiality with regards to your data. We remain responsible for any processing of the data.

The companies we have processor agreements with are:

BDO

Address
Meander 725
6825 ME Arnhem

Description
BDO is Secret View’s partner in financial administration and accountancy. They help us to process all payments to mystery shoppers. They receive the following data:

o  . Address

o  . Bank details

When do they receive this data?
Only once an actual payment to a person is scheduled, BDO receives these details.

Exact Online

Address
Molengraaffsingel 33
2629 JD Delft

Description
Exact Online is the accounting software program Secret View uses to enable payments to community members. Exact Online receives the following data:

o  . Address

o  . Bank details

When do they receive this data?
Only once an actual payment to a person is scheduled, Exact Online receives these details.

Straetus

Address
Pollaan 43, 7202BV Zutphen

Description
Straetus is a collection agency Secret View uses in case of payment issues. Straetus receives the following data:

o  . Sex

o  . Date of birth

o  . Address

o  . Phone number

o  . E-mail address

o  . Location data

o  . Bank details

o  . Paid amounts, including expenses

When do they receive this data?
When a mystery shopper has to refund money (for example, when a compensation hsa not fully been spent or the assignment was cancelled) and the money is not refunded. After 45 days, the collection process is transferred to Straetus.

Microsoft

Address
Evert van de Beekstraat 354
1118 CZ Schiphol

Description
Microsoft is Secret View’s partner for all data hosting. Microsoft receives the following data (encrypted):

o  . Name

o  . Sex

o  . Date of birth

o  . Address

o  . Phone number

o  . E-mail address

o  . Other data that is actively provided by creating a profile, in writing or by phone

o  . Personal interests

o  . Location details

o  . Bank details

o  . Payment history

When do they receive this data?
Microsoft receives this data on a continuous basis in order to store the data safely. The data is encrypted and therefore not accessible to Microsoft.

CM.com

Address
Konijnenberg 30
4825 BD Breda

Description
CM.com is Secret View’s partner in communication with community members through WhatsApp. CM.com receives the following data:

o  . Name

o  . Phone number

When do they receive this data?
When a registered community member actively agrees to being contacted through WhatsApp in their profile on our platform, this data may be used to contact them through WhatsApp.

Mollie B.V.

Address
Keizersgracht 313
11016 EE Amsterdam

Description
Mollie is Secret View’s partner for return payments (unused moneys/cancelled assignments/etc.) from community members to Secret View. Mollie receives the following data:

o  . Address

o  . Banking details

When do they receive this data?
In some cases, community members may need to return an amount of money to Secret View due to cancellations, surpluses after assignments, etc. Please find all information on return payments in our Terms &. Conditions.

Mailjet

Address
4 rue Jules Lefebvre, 75009 Paris, France

Description
Mailjet enables Secret View to send newsletters to people registered on our platform.  Mailjet receives the following data:

o  . Name                               .

o  . Email

When do they receive this data?
When the registered person allows Secret View to use this data for sending newsletters.

Postmark

Description
Postmark enables Secret View to send transactional e-mails (such as ‘Forgot password?’) to people registered on our platform. Postmark receives the following data:

o  . Name                               .

o  . Email

When do they receive this data?

When registering at Secret View. Transactional e-mails are required for the agreement between stakeholders and Secret View.

Crisp.chat

Address
2 Boulevard de Launay, 44100 Nantes, France

Description
Crisp is a chat tool enabling Secret View to support users of our services. If you are not logged in to our platform, the chat will be anonymized. If you are logged in, Crisp will receive the following data:

o  . Name                               .

o  . Email

When do they receive this data?
Wanneer de gebruiker zelf de chat opent and is logged in.

Links

There may be links in Secret View’s communication channels that we are not owned by us. We are not responsible for the content and privacy protection of the websites behind those links. We strongly advise to read the respective website’s privacy policy.

Your rights

You have the right to get insight into your personal data, but also to edit and to delete it. You are free to do so through the personal settings in your account on our platform. Moreover, you have the right to retract your permission to process your personal data or to object to our processing of your data. Also, you have the right to data portability. That means you can ask us to transfer your data in a common format to another organization of your choosing.

Should you like to exercise one or more of these rights, we may ask you to verify your identity via two-factor authentication using e-mail and SMS. You will be sent two codes will have to be verified with Secret View. After this verification, we will grant your request.

We will try to respond as quickly as possible, but within four weeks at the most. We would also like to point out the option of issuing a complaint with the Dutch national authority, the Dutch Data Protection Authority (Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens) through the following link: https://autoriteitpersoonsgegevens.nl/nl/contact-met-de-autoriteit-persoonsgegevens/tip-ons.

How we protect personal data

We take the protection of your personal data very seriously and take fitting measures to prevent and counter abuse, loss, unauthorized access, unwanted publication, and illicit editing of the data.

Please find the most important measures below:

-         . Keeping the online infrastructure updated

-         . Use of security groups

-         . Data encryption

-         . Segmented insight into data

-         . Use of HTTPS in both external and internal communication

-         . Database back-ups

-         . GIT combined with CI/CD for efficient patch management continuation

-         . Stimulating privacy protection awareness with employees

-         . Testing, rating, and evaluating procedures for protective measures

-         . Protocol formulation in case of data leaks or security incidents

-         . Confidentiality agreements

-         . Processor agreements

-         . Minimizing contact with personal data

-         . Keeping track of all data processing activities

-         . Maintaining a data vault

-         . Minimizing reception of personal data by clients

Should you feel your data is not properly protected or there are signs of abuse/misuse of your data, please contact our team at mysteryshopping@secretview.io.

Complaints

You have the right to file a complaint with the Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens (AP) if you feel your data is not being used properly.

Modifications

We can always edit this privacy statement, for example in the event of changes in regulation. We advise you to take a look at this statement regularly.

Version July 25, 2023.

Business Sign Up Algemene Voorwaarden Mystery Shopping for Small Business

26-02-2021

Download als .pdf

This page is currently available in Dutch only.
The English version is coming soon.

Algemeen

1. Deze voorwaarden zijn van toepassing op alle werkzaamheden die wij uitvoeren voor onze opdrachtgevers, tenzij wij hierover andere afspraken maken met een opdrachtgever.
2. Afwijkende of aanvullende afspraken met betrekking tot deze voorwaarden zijn alleen geldig als ze voor het sluiten van de overeenkomst (het ondertekenen van de offerte) schriftelijk zijn overeengekomen en getekend.

Uitvoering onderzoeken

3. Wij doen altijd ons uiterste best om alle onderzoeken zo correct en volledig mogelijk uit te voeren. Afhankelijk van het type onderzoek, bestaan onze werkzaamheden uit de in de offerte opgenomen onderdelen.
4. Als we van start gaan met een onderzoek laten we dat graag aan de hele wereld weten. Daarom plaatsen wij berichten op de website, het platform, de socials en andere media. In het geval van publicaties (analyses, nieuwsartikelen) zal de naam van de opdrachtgever nooit in verband gebracht worden met onderzoeksresultaten die openbaar worden gemaakt en nooit individueel belicht worden.
5. Als opdrachtgever ga je akkoord met ons gebruik van jullie logo, foto’s of andere media-uitingen. Waar wij of jullie dit nodig vinden, gaan we met elkaar in overleg over de wijze waarop dit gebruik plaats kan vinden. Als opdrachtgever sta je ervoor in dat wij de bedoelde materialen kunnen gebruiken zonder dat wij daardoor inbreuk maken op (eventuele) rechten van anderen.
6. Voor aanvang van een onderzoek hebben we gegevens van onze opdrachtgever nodig. Zo kunnen wij er voor zorgen dat de voorbereiding vlekkeloos verloopt. Wij zullen duidelijk aangeven welke gegevens we nodig hebben en jij als opdrachtgever zorgt ervoor dat deze en andere relevante gegevens op tijd aangeleverd worden.
7. De volgende informatie hebben we (indien van toepassing) uiterlijk twee weken voor aanvang van het onderzoek nodig, tenzij we onderling iets anders hebben afgesproken:

  • Factuurgegevens
  • Feedback en andere input op het onderzoek
  • Akkoord op totale onderzoeksopzet
  • Adressenlijst deelnemende locaties
  • Contactgegevens voor accounts
  • Mediabestanden (logo, foto’s, etc.)

8. Zodra wij of onze betaalproviders een betaling hebben ontvangen, starten we met onze werkzaamheden.

Afspraken met betrekking tot de verwerking van persoonsgegevens

9. Voor alle onderzoeken maken wij één of meerdere online dashboards beschikbaar waarop de data inzichtelijk wordt gemaakt aan opdrachtgevers. Hierop verzamelen en verwerken wij, afhankelijk van de onderzoeksmethode, de volgende gegevens:

  • contactgegevens medewerkers, waaronder naam en e-mailadres
  • gegevens winkellocaties
  • meningen van klanten over prestaties op verschillende aspecten (o.a. hygiëne, winkelpersoneel, producten, etc.)
  • meningen van medewerkers over hun werksituatie
  • (uiterlijke) beschrijvingen van medewerkers.

10. Zowel onze opdrachtgevers als wij zelf bepalen voor welke doeleinden de onder 9. bedoelde persoonsgegevens worden verzameld en welke middelen daarbij worden gebruikt. Voor de verwerking van deze persoonsgegevens zijn zowel wij als onze opdrachtgevers verwerkingsverantwoordelijke. Wij zijn dus geen verwerker in de zin van de AVG. Hieronder lees je hoe wij omgaan met de persoonsgegevens die wij ontvangen en hoe de verantwoordelijkheden zijn verdeeld tussen ons en onze opdrachtgevers.
11. Voor de verwerking van de onder 9. genoemde gegevens gebruiken wij onze eigen software, waarin wij ook vastleggen wie er toegang krijgt tot welke gegevens. Wij verwerken de gegevens voor de volgende doeleinden:

  • het kunnen sluiten van een overeenkomst met de opdrachtgever;
  • de uitvoering van de opdracht, waaronder
    undefinedundefinedundefinedundefined
  • het kunnen afhandelen van betalingen;
  • het kunnen opvolgen van klachten en/of meldingen;
  • de uitvoering van een wettelijke verplichting (waaronder fiscale verplichtingen) of een gerechtelijke uitspraak;
  • benchmarking van branches;
  • publiciteit, waaronder publicaties over geanonimiseerde benchmarks
  • het verbeteren van onze diensten.

12. Als opdrachtgever ben je zelf verantwoordelijk om jouw medewerkers (zowel onze contactpersonen als andere medewerkers) overeenkomstig de AVG te informeren over de door ons uit te voeren werkzaamheden.
13. Als wij rechtstreeks verzoeken krijgen van jouw medewerkers met betrekking tot de uitvoering van hun privacyrechten (zoals bijvoorbeeld: inzage, wijziging of verwijdering), dan zullen wij dat verzoek in eerste instantie aan jou doorsturen voor verdere afhandeling. Wij kunnen je eventueel helpen bij de uitvoering van deze verzoeken.
14. Alle data die wij verzamelen wordt veilig opgeslagen. Deze data wordt opgeslagen in een centrale database in de cloud. Het is alleen mogelijk om via vertrouwde locaties een beveiligde verbinding tot stand te brengen. Daarnaast wordt alle communicatie van en naar de database versleuteld.
15. Alle gegevens die worden verzameld tijdens een onderzoek, worden gedurende onze werkzaamheden bewaard en aan jou inzichtelijk gemaakt. Als onze samenwerking eindigt geldt het bepaalde in artikel 32. Daarna zullen de gegevens geanonimiseerd bewaard worden.
16. De persoonsgegevens zullen niet langer worden bewaard dan noodzakelijk is om te voldoen aan de doeleinden onder 11. Persoonsgegevens die om fiscale redenen bewaard moeten blijven, worden na 7 jaar gewist. Persoonsgegevens die relevant kunnen zijn in het kader van de verbetering van onze diensten, zullen zo veel als mogelijk worden geanonimiseerd en bewaard in een geaggregeerde dataset.
17. Jij als opdrachtgever staat ervoor in dat de verwerking van bovengenoemde persoonsgegevens voor bovengenoemde doeleinden rechtmatig is en dus geen inbreuk maakt op de rechten van de betrokken personen. Je vrijwaart ons voor eventuele boetes en aanspraken van derden, waaronder van aanspraken van jouw medewerkers. De kosten die wij moeten maken in verband met dergelijke aanspraken of boetes kunnen wij op jou verhalen.
18. Wij zullen je zo spoedig mogelijk informeren in geval van een datalek (een inbreuk in verband met persoonsgegevens) met betrekking tot de onder 9. bedoelde gegevens. Wij zullen, als de AVG dat vereist, zelfstandig melding doen aan de Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens. Indien ook een melding aan de betrokkenen vereist is, zullen wij in overleg met jou bepalen wie die melding zal doen.
19. Waar dat nodig is, zullen wij samenwerken om gehoor te geven aan de verzoeken of bevelen vanuit de Autoriteit Persoonsgegevens.

Geheimhouding

20. Wij, maar ook onze opdrachtgevers, zijn verplicht om alle vertrouwelijke informatie die wij van elkaar ontvangen hebben, geheim te houden. Wij zorgen er beiden voor dat onze medewerkers zich aan deze verplichting zullen houden. Toegangscodes, wachtwoorden maar ook informatie die wordt verzameld door de mystery shoppers, zijn in ieder geval vertrouwelijk.

Financieel

21. Bij een online opdracht vindt facturering plaats direct bij het plaatsen van de opdracht, tenzij je voor een andere betaalwijze kiest. Het verschuldigde bedrag dient bij het plaatsen van de opdracht te worden voldaan.
22. Bij een online opdracht worden de vergoedingen (of shoptegoeden) voor de mystery shoppers direct bij het plaatsen van de opdracht gefactureerd. Ook deze vergoedingen dienen bij het plaatsen van de opdracht te worden voldaan.
23. Als er vergoedingen worden uitgekeerd aan mystery shoppers die gebruikt worden als shoptegoed, dien je daar twee keer BTW over te betalen. Namelijk ten eerste het moment dat de vergoeding door ons wordt gefactureerd ten tweede het moment dat de BTW afdracht over jouw omzet plaatsvindt. In totaal wordt er dus meer aan vergoedingen uitgekeerd dan wat er terugkeert als omzet.
24. In het geval van liquidatie, faillissement, beslag of surseance van betaling van jouw organisatie, zijn al onze vorderingen op jullie onmiddellijk opeisbaar.

Opzegging en beëindiging door de opdrachtgever

25. Wij streven altijd naar langdurige, doorlopende samenwerkingen. Zo komen onze onderzoeken het best tot hun recht. Als de overeenkomst vroegtijdig (eerder dan de afgesproken looptijd) door jullie wordt opgezegd, dan behouden wij het recht op betaling van onze al uitgevoerde werkzaamheden en gemaakte kosten.
26. Bij vroegtijdige opzegging maken wij aanspraak op compensatie voor de winst die wij daardoor mislopen en/of het verlies dat wij daardoor lijden.
27. De onder 29. bedoelde de compensatie geldt niet als wij toerekenbaar tekort zijn geschoten in de nakoming van onze afspraken en jullie ons tevergeefs schriftelijk in de gelegenheid hebben gesteld deze tekortkoming binnen een redelijke termijn te herstellen.
28. De resultaten van onze werkzaamheden blijven gedurende maximaal drie maanden na het einde van de werkzaamheden beschikbaar. Je kunt ervoor kiezen deze periode, tegen betaling, te verlengen. In geval van vroegtijdige beëindiging, behouden wij ons recht voor de resultaten niet meer beschikbaar te stellen c.q. te houden. Dit geldt niet in de situatie als bedoeld onder 30.

Opschorting en beëindiging door ons

29. Wij behouden ons het recht voor om in sommige situaties en onder bepaalde voorwaarden de overeenkomst te beëindigen (ontbinden of opzeggen) of op te schorten. Die bevoegdheid hebben wij, naast onze wettelijke mogelijkheden, in het geval dat:

  • de verplichtingen uit de overeenkomst door jullie niet of niet volledig worden nagekomen of wanneer er na het sluiten van de overeenkomst gegronde twijfel bestaat over het nakomen van deze verplichtingen;
  • er omstandigheden zijn die het onmogelijk maken om de (ongewijzigde) overeenkomst na te komen.

30. Het inroepen van ons recht op opschorting of beëindiging, staat niet in de weg aan ons (eventuele) recht op schadevergoeding. Bij beëindiging zijn al onze vorderingen op jullie direct opeisbaar.
31. Indien wij tot opschorting of beëindiging overgaan, dan zijn wij niet verplicht tot vergoeding van de eventuele schade die daardoor is of zal ontstaan.

Aansprakelijkheid

32. Wij zijn alleen aansprakelijk voor directe schade met een maximum van tweemaal het jaarlijkse opdrachtbedrag (exclusief de verstrekte shoptegoeden).
33. Wij zijn niet aansprakelijk voor:

  • Indirecte schade, waaronder winstderving, verminderde goodwill, reputatieschade, personeelskosten of bedrijfsstagnatie;
  • het tijdelijk niet beschikbaar zijn van het portaal waarin de onderzoeksresultaten worden gepresenteerd aan haar opdrachtgevers. en
  • eventuele tekortkomingen van mystery shoppers.

34. Als een mystery shopper schade veroorzaakt en daarop door jou als opdrachtgever wordt aangesproken, dan kan de mystery shopper zich ook beroepen op de onder 32. en 33. opgenomen aansprakelijkheidsbeperkingen.
35. Wij kunnen ons niet op een beperking van onze aansprakelijkheid beroepen wanneer de schade is ontstaan door ons eigen opzettelijk of bewust roekeloos handelen.

Overmacht

36. Als wij de overeenkomst niet kunnen nakomen doordat wij daarin gehinderd worden als gevolg van een omstandigheid die buiten onze schuld ligt, dan kunnen we niet gehouden worden aan de verplichtingen in de overeenkomst.
37. Met overmacht bedoelen we, naast wat in de wet bepaald is, alle onvoorziene oorzaken van buitenaf waar wij geen directe invloed op hebben en die ervoor zorgen dat we niet in staat zijn de verplichtingen na te komen.
38. In het geval dat de overmacht langere tijd aanhoudt, kunnen wij de verplichtingen uit de overeenkomst opschorten. Als het langer dan drie maanden duurt, zijn zowel wij als jullie gerechtigd om de overeenkomst op te zeggen, zonder dat daar enige schadevergoeding aan te pas komt.
39. Alle werkzaamheden die wij tot het moment dat overmacht intreedt hebben uitgevoerd, dienen door jullie te worden vergoed.
40. Als de uitvoering van de werkzaamheden onmogelijk of bemoeilijkt wordt als gevolg van overheidsmaatregelen ten gevolge van een pandemie, dan gaan we met elkaar in gesprek over de eventuele beëindiging of de pauzering van de werkzaamheden en de financiële consequenties daarvan.

Toepasselijk recht

41. Op alle overeenkomsten tussen onze organisaties is het Nederlands recht van toepassing.

Business Sign Up Community Terms &. Conditions

25-07-2023

Welcome to Secret View! These terms and conditions are meant to guide and govern the access to and use of the services of Secret View via the platform (https://platform.secretview.io) and the mobile application and all its content.

Secret View is part of Secret Collect B.V. (Velperplein 23, 6811 AH, Arnhem, The Netherlands). In these terms and conditions, Secret View is referred to by “Secret View”, “we” and “us”, and we refer to you as user of our platform as “you”, “mystery shopper” and/or “Community Approver”. By “platform” we refer in these terms and conditions to both Secret View’s website that is only accessible by creating an account (https://platform.secretview.io), and the mobile application.

These terms and conditions are applicable to everyone who registers as a member of Secret View’s community. By registering, you declare that you understand and agree to these terms and conditions. Also, upon registering you declare that you have read and understood our Privacy Statement. After registration, you are fully authorized to do assignments with Secret View.

These terms and conditions are originally written in Dutch. In the event a translation of these terms and conditions conflicts with the Dutch original version, the original version will always take precedence. These terms and conditions may be modified by Secret View at any moment.

Should you have any questions and/or remarks about these terms and conditions, please contact us via the live chat or via mysteryshopping@secretview.io.

Registration

1.      . Only registered users are allowed to do assignments with Secret View. Registration is free. Upon registering, you are obliged to enter your personal details truthfully and completely. You declare not to create an account with the aim of committing fraud, misuse, or abuse. You are solely responsible for keeping your account, the finances, and the security of your password up to date.

2.      . It is not allowed to create more than one account per person.

3.      . There is no working relationship between you and Secret View. As a result, you are solely responsible for any insurances, tax declarations, handling accidents and damages during assignments, et cetera.

Applying for assignments

4.      . All available assignments are shown on the platform.

5.      . You become eligible for an assignment when you apply to or receive an invite for an assignment.

6.      . An assignment has several conditions, such as the timeframe the assignment can be done in and the (financial) reward given for it.

7.      . You can only apply to assignments if you belong to the assignment’s target audience.

8.      . For some assignments it may be mandatory to verify personal data such as your age with a verification tool.

9.      . You only apply for assignments if you agree to the conditions in the assignment description and intend to do the assignment.

10.  . The selection process is based on several aspects such as target audience, location, previous experiences, and quality ratings.

11.  . Secret View may select mystery shoppers for assignments manually and automatically using an algorithm. The algorithm bases its decisions on several aspects such as target audience, quality, speed, and reliability of the mystery shopper based on previous experiences.

Doing assignments

12.  . You will only do an assignment once you have been selected and the overview in your account indicates that the assignment is ready to be carried out.

13.  . You will only do an assignment once you have read and understood all available information, such as the briefing and survey.

14.  . You always check the date range and timeframe within which an assignment must be done before doing an assignment. You can access public information such as a store’s opening hours or a web shop’s delivery times for this information.

15.  . Should anything go wrong during an assignment, you always contact Secret View first before filling out the survey.

16.  . You will only do assignments yourself and will not let anyone else do assignments for you, unless explicitly agreed otherwise.

17.  . You will do every assignment in an honest and thorough manner.

18.  . You will never do any assignment for a client you are in any way related to (e.g. as employee, former employee or friends/family employed by the client).

19.  . In the event you unexpectedly meet someone you know while doing an assignment, and that person works for the client, you will let Secret View know immediately. We will then evaluate whether your research result is still usable.

20.  . You will never do an assignment while under the influence of drugs and/or alcohol.

21.  . You will never visit a specific location of one client more than once every 180 days in order to prevent recognition, unless explicitly agreed otherwise.

22.  . You will always adhere to the given scenario for an assignment.

23.  . You will always ensure your behavior and appearance adhere to the requirements of the assignment.

24.  . In the event you are no longer in the capacity to do an assignment assigned to you it is possible to cancel an assignment. In case you have already received a compensation, you will receive a refund request.

25.  . You will never return a purchase made for regular assignments, unless explicitly allowed or required. This is not applicable for compliance research assignments.

26.  . It is not allowed to resell or rent any products purchased during an assignment.

27.  . You will never reveal yourself as a mystery shopper to the client, unless explicitly allowed or required.

28.  . It is not allowed to initiate contact with one of Secret View’s clients concerning an assignment, unless explicitly allowed or required.

29.  . Secret View maintains the right to modify an assignment, the selection of an assignment, and to cancel an assignment at any time.

Doing compliance research assignments

30.      . In the event an assignment requires you to purchase products that have an age restriction, such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco, it is your responsibility to handle these products carefully and correctly (i.e. according to local laws).

31.      . You will buy a maximum of one age-restricted product unless explicitly stated otherwise in the assignment.

32.      . You will always return age-restricted purchases you may have done for your compliance research assignment to the client of Secret View through the method indicated in the assignment, unless explicitly stated otherwise in the assignment. This does not apply to regular mystery shopping assignments.

33.      . In case you do duo-assignments, with one minor mystery shopper and an adult supervising mystery shopper, both mystery shoppers guarantee that age-restricted products are always handed over to the supervising adult immediately after purchase.

Delivering research results

34.  . You always fill out the survey of an assignment within the indicated time limit, unless agreed otherwise.

35.  . You always follow Secret View’s guidance regarding the survey.

36.  . You ensure the survey reflects factual events and not opinions, unless requested otherwise.

37.  . You safely store all notes and documentation (photos, brochures, receipts, etc.) you may have collected for an assignment during at least one month after the assignment. Also, you will provide this documentation to Secret View upon request.

38.  . You make sure that all explanations, descriptions, and other answers to survey questions are:

a.      . Informative and give a precise description of the mystery shopping visit

b.      . Clear and do not contradict other answers in the survey

c.      . Objective, complete, and free of excessive use of punctuation marks

d.      . Free of opinions, assumptions, comparisons, and conclusions unless specifically requested otherwise

e.      . Constructively formulated and elaborated on when requested

f.       . Motivating and descriptive for the receivers of the feedback

 

Community Approval

39.  . Community Approvers are members of the Secret View community who do so-called micro-assignments for a small financial compensation. The reward per assignment may differ and may be modified by Secret View at any time.

40.  . As a Community Approver, you are free to choose when you work and how much work you do.

41.  . By accepting the role of Community Approver, you declare to understand and accept the rules that are shared with you.

42.  . The Community Approver role may be assigned to a community member on request and may be removed from an account by Secret View at any time without giving any reason.

Financial

43.  . You receive a compensation per assignment on the bank account that you provided in your account on our platform. The amount is indicated in the assignment description. Some assignments may have additional expense compensations, these are also included in the assignment description.

44.  . When you receive a shopping budget for an assignment, you always spend the full amount during your assignment, unless agreed otherwise. Oftentimes it is allowed to spend more than the shopping budget at your own expense, unless stated otherwise.

45.  . Compensations may be transferred before or after having done your assignment, or a combination of both. The payment method is indicated in the assignment description.

46.  . Secret View may for various reasons ask you to refund a previously received (partial) compensation. A refund request must be complied with within 14 days. In case the refund is neglected, Secret View may turn to debt collection measures leading to collection costs of at least €40.00 euros. Reasons for requesting a refund may be:

a.      . The assignment was not or not correctly done

b.      . The survey was not or not correctly filled out

c.      . The total amount spent was less than the shopping budget received

47.  . A refund request can only be fulfilled via the process initiated by Secret View. Self-initiated transfers to Secret View’s bank account cannot be processed.

48.  . You are solely responsible for declaring your income with Secret View to your local tax authorities.

49.  . You are solely responsible for payment of any turnover taxes if applicable in your situation.

50.  . You are solely responsible for keeping track of your earnings with Secret View and the consequences of these earnings on your tax situation and any social securities or contributions you may receive.

51.  . Secret Views pays all community members under the Dutch IB-47 regulation. This regulation stipulates that you do not earn a salary but are compensated financially for the assignments carried out.

52.  . Secret View registers all payments for assignments with the Dutch tax authorities (De Belastingdienst), which is why we need personal details such as your address. Your earnings with Secret View usually count as ‘income from other work’, but please check with your local authorities.

53  . Secret View cannot accommodate invoicing to and from freelancers and other entrepreneurs who are registered as community members for their assignment compensations.

Confidentiality and privacy

54.  . You will never share information about the performance of (a location of) one of Secret View’s clients related to an assignment with others.

55.  . You will never initiate contact with one of Secret View’s clients without previous written consent from Secret View.

56.  . You will never approach or use any media outlet to voice complaints about Secret View or its clients. If you have any complains, please let us know by sending us an e-mail at mysteryshopping@secretview.io.

57.  . We handle your personal information with the utmost care and will never share your information with third parties without your consent. Please find more about this in our Privacy Statement.

Terminating the relationship

58.  . The relationship between you and Secret View can be terminated by you at any time if all payments and refund requests have been finalized.

59.  . The relationship between you and Secret View can be terminated by Secret View at any time without giving any reason.

60.  . When there is reasonable suspicion or proof of misuse, abuse, fraud, theft or otherwise not adhering to these terms and conditions, Secret View maintains the right to claim €500,00 for damages, to demand the refund of all or part of the received compensations, to immediately terminate the account, and if necessary to press charges and/or take subsequent legal action.

61.  . If you would like to terminate the relationship between you and Secret View, you can delete your account on our platform.

Business Sign Up Yum, cookies!

25-01-2022

Renew or change your cookie consent

We may use cookies to enhance your user experience on our website and platform. Cookies are small bits of information that are saved on your computer while you browse the website and platform. Cookies make sure you can be recognized when you log in, they help us make the pages load faster, save your data in a safe place and allow us to detect bugs and other errors in our website and software.

Don't want to receive cookies? You can delete them in your browser settings. Remember that the software may be slower and not perform as well!

You consent to our cookies if you continue to use our website. The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies, we need your permission. This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third party services that appear on our pages.

You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie Declaration on our website.

Functional cookies

We use cookies with a purely functional purpose. These ensure our website performs as intended and your preferences are saved.

Analytical cookies

We try to analyze the behavior of visitors on our website. This way we try to determine our visitors’ interest, maintain, and optimize the website’s functionality. That is why we store analytical cookies in your browser.

Using these cookies we collect information about your computer, operating system, browser, statistics on pageviews, traffic to and from the website, location, the referring URL, and the IP address.

Google Analytics and Application Insights

In order to analyze the data, we use the services of Google Analytics and Application Insights. To that end we have processor agreements with these parties. We guarantee that whenever personal data is processed that data is encrypted. Also, the last eight numbers of the IP address are hidden.

Tracking cookies and third-party cookies

We also store cookies that track your behavior on the internet so we can provide you with content and adverts that are relevant to you.

Google Maps
Our website and the platform may use Google Maps. This allows us to display geographical maps and travel directions on websites. To use this service, we need to place several cookies to remember your preferences.

Social media

Our website may contain buttons to promote or share (“like”, “tweet”, “share”) content and/or pages to social media such as LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. These buttons contain small pieces of code that store cookies we cannot influence. We recommend reading the respective privacy statements of these companies to find out how they process personal data.

LinkedIn:                   .            . https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy

Twitter:                     .            . https://twitter.com/privacy/         .

Facebook (also Instagram): http://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/        .

The information gathered by these parties is anonymized as much as possible. The information is transferred to LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter and may be stored on servers outside of the European Union.

Cookie preferences

You may edit your cookie preferences so that they are no longer stored on your computer. Please go to the bottom of this text to edit your preferences. Moreover, you can delete all information that has previously been stored by navigating to your browser’s settings.

Without cookies, some parts of the website and platform may not work properly or work at all.
